description:
Thanks to Gintoki and Katsura, the space pirates ship is brought down. Several antiforeigner factions use this opportunity to take down high government officials who profited from their illegal drug collusion with pirates and Amantos. The Shinsengumi is ordered to provide protection for the officials. Kondo unquestioningly carries out his duty, claiming that if it weren’t for the government the Shinsengumi wouldn’t be where it is today. But the members cannot hide their frustration toward the corrupt Amanto and government officials. Amidst all of this, Kondo is shot down by the antiforeigner faction, taking the hit intended for a frog Amanto they were assigned to protect. Just when the Shinsengumi’s frustration is about to explode, they hear Hijikata shouting…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Otoko ni wa Kaeru ni Sawarete Ichininmae Mitai na Wake no Wakaranai Ruuru ga Aru / Waki Dake Arattokya Iindayo Waki Dake
Um als echter Mann zu gelten, musst du erst einen Frosch berühren!
You Only Gotta Wash Under Your Armpits / Just the Armpits
男にはカエルに触れて一人前, みたいな訳の分からないルールがある / 脇だけ洗っときゃいいんだよ脇だけ
